results.definition: (pathology) an elevation of the skin filled with serous fluid

examples: The Senator blistered the administration in his speech on Friday
Her feet blistered during the long hike

results.definition: a flaw on a surface resulting when an applied substance does not adhere (as an air bubble in a coat of paint)
(botany) a swelling on a plant similar to that on the skin

examples: the tight shoes and perspiration blistered her feet
